General.Name: Callon Petroleum Company
General.Description: Callon Petroleum Company, an independent oil and natural gas company, focuses on the acquisition, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas properties in West Texas. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: One Briarlake Plaza, Houston, TX, United States, 77042
